meanings.sent1: She predestinates her daily schedule the night before.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast predestinates our plans for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The cat predestinates to nap in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music predestinates him to become a famous composer one day.
meanings.sent5: The fortune teller's prediction predestinates a prosperous future for you.

meanings.sent1: The prophecy predestinates the hero to defeat the evil sorcerer.
meanings.sent2: The scholarship predestinates the student to attend the prestigious university.
meanings.sent3: The magic mirror predestinates who will be the fairest of them all.
meanings.sent4: The ancient scroll predestinates the chosen one to save the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The enchanted amulet predestinates its wearer to wield great power.
